home.text_base_description: Loft Living on Border of SOMA & MISSION BAY | Located between two prized neighborhoods, this lofted condo blends the style and popularity of SoMa with the easy accessibility of Mission Bay. Sun-lit interiors with beautiful wood floors include an in-unit laundry, open-concept living area with fireplace and skylight, sophisticated kitchen with stainless appliances, and sizable bedrooms and baths. The private rooftop patio affords scenic views of the district. Includes exclusive storage area and parking for one car. Enjoy living within steps of bus services, 4th St. & King Light Rail and Caltrain stations, Starbucks, Philz Coffee, Safeway, Mission Creek Park, and popular dining. Surrounded by offices of major companies like Adobe, Zynga, Lyft, Airbnb, and Pinterest, you'll have excellent proximity to Chase Center, Oracle Park, and the many, many iconic attractions along the Embarcadero.
